text: Ani anathacya sampatticya javalahi ja'u naka, tathapi khupa cangalya pad'dhatine, yetheparyanta ki te tarunyavasthesa pohocaveta, ani n'yayasaha mapa-tola purna kara. Amhi konavara tyacya kuvatipeksa jasta bhara thevata nahi ani jevha bolala, tevha n'yaya kara, maga to javalaca nateva'ika ka asena ani allahasi kelela vayada purna kara. Tyane tumha lokanna yacaca adesa dila ahe yasathi ki tumhi smarana rakhave
